            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Your initial opinion on just about anything may change over time.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мне все равно.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I wish I could tell you that the Baudelaires' first impressions of
            Count Olaf and his house were incorrect, as first impressions so
            often are.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Большое спасибо, мистер По, за то, что доставили их сюда.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But these impressions-that Count Olaf was a horrible person, and his
            house a depressing pigsty-were absolutely correct.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Пойдемте, дети, я покажу вам вашу комнату.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            During the first few days after the orphans arrival at Count Olaf's,
            Violet, Klaus, and Sunny attempted to make themselves feel at home,
            but it was really no use.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – До свидания, Вайолет, Клаус и Солнышко.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Even though Count Olaf's house was quite large, the three children
            were placed together in one filthy bedroom that had only one small
            bed in it.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мистер По попятился к двери.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet and Klaus took turns sleeping in it, so that every other
            night one of them was in the bed and the other was sleeping on the
            hard wooden floor, and the bed's mattress was so lumpy it was
            difficult to say who was more uncomfortable.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Надеюсь, вам тут будет очень хорошо.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            To make a bed for Sunny, Violet removed the dusty curtains from the
            curtain rod that hung over the bedroom's one window and bunched them
            together to form a sort of cushion, just big enough for her sister.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Я иногда буду приходить, а меня всегда можно найти в банке, если у
            вас возникнут вопросы.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            However, without curtains over the cracked glass, the sun streamed
            through the window every morning, so the children woke up early and
            sore each day.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Но мы даже не знаем, где ваш банк, – возразил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Instead of a closet, there was a large cardboard box that had once
            held a refrigerator and would now hold the three children's clothes,
            all piled in a heap.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – У меня есть карта города, – вмешался Граф Олаф.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Instead of toys, books, or other things to amuse the youngsters,
            Count Olaf had provided a small pile of rocks.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – До свидания, мистер По.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            And the only decoration on the peeling walls was a large and ugly
            painting of an eye, matching the one on Count Olaf's ankle and all
            over the house.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С этими словами он протянул руку к двери и закрыл ее, а трое сирот
            впали в такое отчаяние, что даже не успели бросить прощальный взгляд
            на мистера По.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But the children knew, as I'm sure you know, that the worst
            surroundings in the world can be tolerated if the people in them are
            interesting and kind.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Им сейчас хотелось одного – остаться у мистера По, пусть у него в
            доме и стоит противный запах.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf was neither interesting nor kind; he was demanding,
            short-tempered, and bad-smelling.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Чтобы не смотреть на закрывавшуюся дверь, дети опустили глаза… И тут
            они заметили, что на ногах у Графа Олафа нет носков! А между
            обтрепанными отворотами брюк и черными башмаками на бледной коже
            ясно виднеется изображение глаза – точь-в-точь такое, как на входной
            двери.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The only good thing to be said for Count Olaf is that he wasn't
            around very often.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Интересно, подумалось им, сколько же еще глаз в доме у Графа Олафа?
            И неужели всю жизнь им суждено теперь ощущать, что Граф Олаф
            наблюдает за ними, даже когда его нет поблизости?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            When the children woke up and chose their clothing out of the
            refrigerator box, they would walk into the kitchen and find a list
            of instructions left for them by Count Olaf, who would often not
            appear until nighttime.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Глава третья
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Most of the day he spent out of the house, or up in the high tower,
            where the children were forbidden to go.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Не знаю, замечали ли вы, что первые впечатления часто бывают
            обманчивыми.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The instructions he left for them were usually difficult chores,
            such as repainting the back porch or repairing the windows, and
            instead of a signature Count Olaf would draw an eye at the bottom of
            the note.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вы, например, впервые смотрите на какую-то картину, и она вам
            совершенно не нравится.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            One morning his note read, ``My theater troupe will be coming for
            dinner before tonight's performance.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но, присмотревшись, вы находите, что она совсем недурна.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Have dinner ready for all ten of them by the time they arrive at
            seven o'clock.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Когда впервые вы пробуете горгонзолу (это такой голубой сыр с
            плесенью), он вам может показаться чересчур острым, но с возрастом
            вам может захотеться есть исключительно сыр с плесенью.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Buy the food, prepare it, set the table, serve dinner, clean up
            afterwards, and stay out of our way.'' Below that there was the
            usual eye, and underneath the note was a small sum of money for the
            groceries.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаусу, когда Солнышко только родилась, она совсем не понравилась,
            но к тому моменту, как ей исполнилось шесть недель, их было уже не
            разлить водой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet and Klaus read the note as they ate their breakfast, which
            was a gray and lumpy oatmeal Count Olaf left for them each morning
            in a large pot on the stove.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            И так со временем может перемениться ваше первоначальное мнение по
            любому поводу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Then they looked at each other in dismay.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Хотелось бы мне сказать вам, что первое впечатление у детей от Графа
            Олафа и его дома тоже оказалось неверным.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``None of us knows how to cook,'' Klaus said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но, увы, их впечатление, что Граф Олаф кошмарный тип, а дом его –
            удручающе грязный свинарник, было абсолютно правильным.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``That's true,'' Violet said. ``I knew how to repair those windows,
            and how to clean the chimney, because those sorts of things interest
            me.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Первые несколько дней после вселения к Графу Олафу Вайолет, Клаус и
            Солнышко очень старались почувствовать себя как дома, но из этого
            ничего не вышло.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But I don't know how to cook anything except toast.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Дом у Графа Олафа был вполне просторный, но он почему-то поместил
            всех в одну грязную спальню с одной небольшой кроватью.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``And sometimes you burn the toast,'' Klaus said, and they smiled.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет с Клаусом спали на ней по очереди, так что каждую ночь
            кто-то спал на кровати, а кто-то на твердом дощатом полу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            They were both remembering a time when the two of them got up early
            to make a special breakfast for their parents.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Однако матрас на постели был такой комкастый, что еще неизвестно,
            кому было хуже.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet had burned the toast, and their parents, smelling smoke, had
            run downstairs to see what the matter was.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Чтобы устроить постель для Солнышка, Вайолет пришлось снять с
            единственного окна в спальне пыльную штору и сложить ее в несколько
            раз, устроив таким образом подобие гнезда как раз по размерам
            маленькой сестры.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            When they saw Violet and Klaus, looking forlornly at pieces of
            pitch-black toast, they laughed and laughed, and then made pancakes
            for the whole family.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Зато без занавески солнце с раннего утра светило в комнату через
            треснувшее оконное стекло, так что дети просыпались рано и
            совершенно разбитые.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I wish they were here,'' Violet said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вместо стенного шкафа в комнате имелся большой картонный ящик из-под
            холодильника, и туда-то кучей, одна вещь на другую, дети складывали
            свою одежду.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She did not have to explain she was talking about their parents.
            ``They would never let us stay in this dreadful place.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вместо игрушек, книг и прочих развлечений Граф Олаф приготовил для
            них груду булыжников.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``If they were here,'' Klaus said, his voice rising as he got more
            and more upset, ``we would not be with Count Olaf in the first
            place.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А единственным украшением на облезлых стенах было огромное уродливое
            изображение глаза – точно такое, как на щиколотке у Графа Олафа и
            повсюду в доме.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I hate it here, Violet! I hate this house! Ihate our room! I hate
            having to do all these chores, and I hate Count Olaf!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Дети знали, как наверняка знаете и вы, что самые скверные условия
            жизни переносить легче, если рядом с вами интересные и добрые люди.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I hate it too,'' Violet said, and Klaus looked at his older sister
            with relief.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф не был ни интересным, ни добрым: он был требовательным,
            раздражительным, и от него дурно пахло.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Sometimes, just saying that you hate something, and having someone
            agree with you, can make you feel better about a terrible situation.
            ``I hate everything about our lives right now, Klaus,'' she said,
            ``but we have to keep our chin up.'' This was an expression the
            children's father had used, and it meant ``try to stay cheerful.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Единственно, что можно сказать в его пользу, – он редко бывал дома.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You're right,'' Klaus said. ``But it is very difficult to keep
            one's chin up when Count Olaf keeps shoving it down.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Проснувшись поутру и вытащив свою одежду из ящика, дети шли на кухню
            и там находили оставленный Графом Олафом список распоряжений.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Jook!'' Sunny shrieked, banging on the table with her oatmeal
            spoon.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Сам он частенько являлся домой только глубокой ночью.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet and Klaus were jerked out of their conversation and looked
            once again at Count Olaf's note.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Большую часть дня он проводил вне дома или же наверху в башне, куда
            детям ходить запрещалось.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Perhaps we could find a cookbook, and read about how to cook,''
            Klaus said. ``It shouldn't be that difficult to make a simple
            meal.'' Violet and Klaus spent several minutes opening and shutting
            Count Olaf's kitchen cupboards, but there weren't any cookbooks to
            be found.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Задания он обычно давал им труднейшие: к примеру, перекрасить заднее
            крыльцо или же починить окна.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I can't say I'm surprised,'' Violet said. ``We haven't found any
            books in this house at all.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вместо подписи Граф Олаф рисовал внизу записки глаз.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I know,'' Klaus said miserably. ``I miss reading very much.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            И вот однажды оставленная им записка гласила: «Моя труппа зайдет
            пообедать перед вечерним представлением.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            We must go out and look for a library sometime soon.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вы должны купить продукты, приготовить их, накрыть на стол, подать
            обед, убрать со стола и не путаться у нас под ногами».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``But not today,'' Violet said. ``Today we have to cook for ten
            people.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Внизу, как обычно, красовался глаз, а на столе под запиской к лежала
            небольшая сумма денег на покупки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            At that moment there was a knock on the front door.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет и Клаус прочитали записку за завтраком, состоявшим из серой
            с комками овсяной каши, какую Граф Олаф оставлял им каждое утро в
            кастрюльке на плите.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet and Klaus looked at one another nervously.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Прочтя, они в испуге уставились друг на друга.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Who in the world would want to visit Count Olaf?'' Violet wondered
            out loud.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мы же не умеем готовить, – сказал Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Maybe somebody wants to visit us,'' Klaus said, without much hope.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Верно, – вздохнула Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            In the time since the Baudelaire parent's death, most of the
            Baudelaire orphans' friends had fallen by the wayside, an expression
            which here means ``they stopped calling, writing, and stopping by to
            see any of Baudelaires, making them very lonely.'' You and I, of
            course, would never do this to any of our grieving acquaintances,
            but it is a sad truth in life that when someone has lost a loved
            one, friends sometimes avoid the person, just when the presence of
            friends is most needed.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я знаю, как починить окна и как прочистить дымоход, только потому,
            что меня такие вещи интересуют.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet, Klaus, and Sunny walked slowly to the front door and peered
            through the peephole, which was in the shape of an eye.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но я не умею готовить ничего, кроме тостов.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            They were delighted to see Justice Strauss peering back at them, and
            opened the door.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – И то иногда их сжигаешь, – подхватил Клаус, и они улыбнулись.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Justice Strauss!'' Violet cried. ``How lovely to see you.'' She
            was about to add, ``Do come in,'' but then she realized that Justice
            Strauss would probably not want to venture into the dim and dirty
            room.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Оба вспомнили, как однажды встали пораньше, чтобы приготовить
            завтрак специально для родителей.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Please forgive me for not stopping by sooner,'' Justice Strauss
            said, as the Baudelaires stood awkwardly in the doorway. ``I wanted
            to see how you children were settling in, but I had a very difficult
            case in the High Court and it was taking up much of my time.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Тост у Вайолет сгорел, и родители, почуяв гарь, прибежали сверху
            посмотреть, в чем дело.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``What sort of case was it?'' Klaus asked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Когда их глазам предстали Вайолет и Клаус, в отчаянии глядевшие на
            угольки сгоревшего хлеба, они долго хохотали, а потом напекли оладий
            на всю семью.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Having been deprived of reading, he was hungry for new information.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вот бы они были тут, – вздохнула Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I can't really discuss it,'' Justice Strauss said, ``because it's
            official business.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Не требовалось объяснять, кого она имеет в виду.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But I can tell you it concerns a poisonous plant and illegal use of
            someone's credit card.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Они бы не отправили нас в это ужасное место.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Yeeka!'' Sunny shrieked, which appeared to mean ``How
            interesting!'' although of course there is no way that Sunny could
            understand what was being said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Будь они тут, – от волнения голос у Клауса звучал все громче, – мы
            бы вообще не оказались у Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Justice Strauss looked down at Sunny and laughed. ``Yeeka indeed,''
            she said, and reached down to pat the child on the head.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Ненавижу я тут все, Вайолет! Ненавижу дом! Ненавижу нашу комнату!
            Ненавижу эти задания! Ненавижу Графа Олафа!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Sunny took Justice Strauss's hand and bit it, gently.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я тоже, – сказала Вайолет, и Клаус с облегчением посмотрел на
            старшую сестру.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``That means she likes you,'' Violet explained.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Бывает так – просто скажешь, что ненавидишь что-то, а кто-то с тобой
            согласится, и тебе сразу полегчает, хотя ситуация и останется такой
            же ужасной.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``She bites very, very hard if she doesn't like you, or if you want
            to give her a bath.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мне ненавистна наша теперешняя жизнь, Клаус, – продолжала Вайолет,
            – но нам остается одно – держать голову над водой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I see,'' Justice Strauss said. ``Now then, how are you children
            getting on? Is there anything you desire?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Это выражение любил повторять их отец, и означает оно – «постараться
            не падать духом».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The children looked at one another, thinking of all the things they
            desired.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Ты права, – согласился Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Another bed, for example.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Только очень трудно держать голову над водой, когда Граф Олаф
            толкает ее под воду.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            A proper crib for Sunny.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Джук! – выкрикнула Солнышко, колотя ложкой по столу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Curtains for the window in their room.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет и Клаус опомнились и поскорей вернулись к обсуждению записки
            Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            A closet instead of a cardboard box.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вот если бы найти поваренную книгу и почитать ее, – предложил
            Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But what they desired most of all, of course, was not to be
            associated with Count Olaf in any way whatsoever.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Наверное, не так уж трудно приготовить что-нибудь простое.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            What they desired most was to be with their parents again, in their
            true home, but that, of course, was impossible.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Несколько минут дети открывали и закрывали кухонные шкафчики, но
            никаких поваренных книг не обнаружили.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet, Klaus, and Sunny all looked down at the floor unhappily as
            they considered the question.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Нисколько не удивляюсь, – заметила Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Finally, Klaus spoke.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мы вообще ни одной книги в доме не видали.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Could we perhaps borrow a cookbook?'' he said. ``Count Olaf has
            instructed us to make dinner for his theater troupe tonight, and we
            can't find a cookbook in the house.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Да, – печально поддакнул Клаус, – а мне так не хватает книжек.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Goodness,'' Justice Strauss said. ``Cooking dinner for an entire
            theater troupe seems like a lot to ask of children.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Надо будет на днях пойти поискать библиотеку.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Count Olaf gives us a lot of responsibility,'' Violet said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Но не сегодня, – одернула его Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            What she wanted to say was, ``Count Olaf is an evil man,'' but she
            was well mannered.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Сегодня мы должны приготовить обед на десять человек.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Well, why don't you come next door to my house,'' Justice Strauss
            said, ``and find a cookbook that pleases you?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            В эту минуту с улицы раздался стук в дверь.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The youngsters agreed, and followed Justice Strauss out the door and
            over to her well-kept house.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет и Клаус с волнением уставились друг на друга.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She led them through an elegant hallway smelling of flowers into an
            enormous room, and when they saw what was inside, they nearly
            fainted from delight, Klaus especially.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Кому могло вздуматься навещать Графа Олафа? – с недоумением
            произнесла Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The room was a library.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А может, кому-то захотелось повидать нас? – без особой надежды
            предположил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Not a public library, but a private library; that is, a large
            collection of books belonging to Justice Strauss.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С тех пор как Бодлеры-родители умерли, большинство бодлеровских
            друзей исчезли, что в данном случае означает «они перестали звонить,
            писать и заходить к сиротам, отчего те чувствовали себя очень
            одиноко».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            There were shelves and shelves of them, on every wall from the floor
            to the ceiling, and separate shelves and shelves of them in the
            middle of the room.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Мы-то с вами никогда бы так не поступили со своими горюющими
            знакомыми, но такова уж жестокая правда жизни: стоит кому-то
            потерять близкого человека, и друзья нередко начинают его избегать,
            хотя именно тут и требуется их присутствие.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The only place there weren't books was in one corner, where there
            were some large, comfortable-looking chairs and a wooden table with
            lamps hanging over them, perfect for reading.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет, Клаус и Солнышко медленно приблизились к входной двери и
            посмотрели в глазок, который, естественно, имел форму глаза.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Although it was not as big as their parents' library, it was as
            cozy, and the Baudelaire children were thrilled.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С какой же радостью они увидели судью Штраус, которая глядела на них
            с той стороны.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``My word!'' Violet said. ``This is a wonderful library!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они распахнули дверь.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Thank you very much,'' Justice Strauss said. ``I've been
            collecting books for years, and I'm very proud of my collection.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Судья Штраус! – вскричала Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            As long as you keep them in good condition, you are welcome to use
            any of my books, at any time.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Как мы рады вас видеть! – Она хотела добавить: «Заходите,
            пожалуйста», но спохватилась, что судье Штраус, возможно, будет
            неприятно входить в грязную, темную комнату.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Now, the cookbooks are over here on the eastern wall.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Простите, что не зашла к вам раньше,– сказала судья Штраус детям,
            неловко топтавшимся в дверях.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Shall we have a look at them?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я все собиралась взглянуть, как вы тут устроились на новом месте,
            но в суде как раз проходило очень трудное дело, и оно отнимало у
            меня почти все время.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Yes,'' Violet said, ``and then, if you don't mind, I should love
            to look at any of your books concerning mechanical engineering.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А в чем оно заключается? – осведомился Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Inventing things is a great interest of mine.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Поскольку он был лишен чтения книг, он жаждал любой информации.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``And I would like to look at books on wolves,'' Klaus said.
            ``Recently I have been fascinated by the subject of wild animals of
            North America.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я, в общем-то, не имею права это обсуждать,– ответила судья
            Штраус,– оно касается должностных лиц.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Book!'' Sunny shrieked, which meant ``Please don't forget to pick
            out a picture book for me.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Могу только сказать, что речь идет о ядовитом растении и незаконном
            использовании кредитной карточки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Justice Strauss smiled. ``It is a pleasure to see young people
            interested in books,'' she said. ``But first I think we'd better
            find a good recipe, don't you?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Йи-ика! – выкрикнула Солнышко, как будто хотела сказать: «Как
            интересно!», хотя, конечно, вряд ли она поняла, о чем шел разговор.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The children agreed, and for thirty minutes or so they perused
            several cookbooks that Justice Strauss recommended.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Судья Штраус опустила глаза.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            To tell you the truth, the three orphans were so excited to be out
            of Count Olaf's house, and in this pleasant library, that they were
            a little distracted and unable to concentrate on cooking.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вот именно.– Она засмеялась и протянула руку, чтобы погладить
            девочку по голове.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But finally Klaus found a dish that sounded delicious, and easy to
            make.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Солнышко тут же схватила ее руку и легонько куснула.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Listen to this,'' he said. `` ``Puttanesca.'' It's an Italian
            sauce for pasta.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Это значит, вы ей нравитесь,– объяснила Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            All we need to do is sauté olives, capers, anchovies, garlic,
            chopped parsley, and tomatoes together in a pot, and prepare
            spaghetti to go with it.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Она очень больно кусается, когда ей кто-то не нравится или когда
            ее купают.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``That sounds easy,'' Violet agreed, and the Baudelaire orphans
            looked at one another.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Понятно,– отозвалась судья Штраус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
