          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Perhaps, with the kind Justice Strauss and her library right next
            door, the children could prepare pleasant lives for themselves as
            easily as making puttanesca sauce for Count Olaf.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – И как же вы поживаете? Нет ли чего-нибудь, чего бы вам хотелось?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Chapter Four
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Дети переглянулись.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The Baudelaire orphans copied the puttanesca recipe from the
            cookbook onto a piece of scrap paper, and Justice Strauss was kind
            enough to escort them to the market to buy the necessary
            ingredients.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они перебрали в уме все, чего бы им хотелось.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf had not left them very much money, but the children were
            able to buy everything they needed.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Например, еще одну кровать.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            From a street vendor, they purchased olives after tasting several
            varieties and choosing their favorites.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Настоящую детскую кроватку для Солнышка.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            At a pasta store they selected interestingly shaped noodles and
            asked the woman running the store the proper amount for thirteen
            people-the ten people Count Olaf mentioned, and the three of them.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Занавеску на окно.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Then, at the supermarket, they purchased garlic, which is a
            sharp-tasting bulbous plant; anchovies, which are small salty fish;
            capers, which are flower buds of a small shrub and taste marvelous;
            and tomatoes, which are actually fruits and not vegetables as most
            people believe.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Стенной шкаф вместо картонного ящика.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            They thought it would be proper to serve dessert, and bought several
            envelopes of pudding mix.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но больше всего им, естественно, хотелось никогда, ни под каким
            видом не иметь дела с Графом Олафом.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Perhaps, the orphans thought, if they made a delicious meal, Count
            Olaf might be a bit kinder to them.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Хотелось снова жить с родителями в родном доме.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Thank you so much for helping us out today,'' Violet said, as she
            and her siblings walked home with Justice Strauss. ``I don't know
            what we would have done without you.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но это было невозможно.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You seem like very intelligent people,'' Justice Strauss said. ``I
            daresay you would have thought of something.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Поэтому все трое грустно уставились в пол, раздумывая над вопросом.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But it continues to strike me as odd that Count Olaf has asked you
            to prepare such an enormous meal.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Наконец Клаус ответил:
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Well, here we are.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Нельзя ли взять у вас поваренную книгу? Граф Олаф велел нам
            приготовить сегодня к вечеру обед для его труппы, а поваренной книги
            в его доме мы не нашли.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I must go inside and put my own groceries away.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вот так штука! – воскликнула судья Штраус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I hope you children will come over soon and borrow books from my
            library.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Приготовить обед на целую театральную труппу! По-моему, это значит
            взваливать на детей слишком большой груз.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Tomorrow?'' Klaus said quickly. ``Could we come over tomorrow?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Граф Олаф возлагает на нас большую ответственность.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I don't see why not,'' Justice Strauss said, smiling.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – На самом деле Вайолет хотелось сказать: «Граф Олаф очень плохой
            человек», но она была девочка воспитанная.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I can't tell you how much we appreciate this,'' Violet said,
            carefully.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Хорошо, почему бы вам в таком случае не пройти два шага до моего
            дома и не подобрать себе подходящую поваренную книгу?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            With their kind parents dead and Count Olaf treating them so
            abominably, the three children were not used to kindness from
            adults, and weren't sure if they were expected to do anything back.
            ``Tomorrow, before we use your library again, Klaus and I would be
            more than happy to do household chores for you.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Дети с готовностью отправились вслед за судьей Штраус в ее опрятный
            домик.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Sunny isn't really old enough to work, but I'm sure we could find
            some way she could help you.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Она провела их через нарядный холл, где пахло цветами, в огромную
            комнату, и, когда они увидели, что там находится, они чуть в обморок
            не упали от восторга, особенно Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Justice Strauss smiled at the three children, but her eyes were sad.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Потому что это была библиотека.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She reached out a hand and put it on Violet's hair, and Violet felt
            more comforted than she had in some time. ``That won't be
            necessary,'' Justice Strauss said. ``You are always welcome in my
            home.'' Then she turned and went into her home, and after a moment
            of staring after her, the Baudelaire orphans went into theirs.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Не публичная, а частное собрание книг, принадлежащее судье Штраус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            For most of the afternoon, Violet, Klaus, and Sunny cooked the
            puttanesca sauce according to the recipe.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Полки шли вдоль каждой стены от пола до потолка, отдельные полки
            стояли в разных местах комнаты, а также посредине комнаты.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet roasted the garlic and washed and chopped the anchovies.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Единственным местом без книг был один из углов, где стояли несколько
            удобных на вид стульев и деревянный столик, а над ними свисали лампы
            – идеальное место для чтения.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus peeled the tomatoes and pitted the olives.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Не такая большая библиотека, как у родителей, но такая же уютная, и
            бодлеровские дети пришли в полный восторг.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Sunny banged on a pot with a wooden spoon, singing a rather
            repetitive song she had written herself.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вот это да! – вскричала Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            And all three of the children felt less miserable than they had
            since their arrival at Count Olaf's.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Какая замечательная библиотека!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The smell of cooking food is often a calming one, and the kitchen
            grew cozy as the sauce simmered, a culinary term which means
            ``cooked over low heat.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Большое спасибо, – поблагодарила судья Штраус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The three orphans spoke of pleasant memories of their parents and
            about Justice Strauss, who they agreed was a wonderful neighbor and
            in whose library they planned to spend a great deal of time.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я собирала ее много лет и очень горжусь своим собранием.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            As they talked, they mixed and tasted the chocolate pudding.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Можете брать какие угодно книги и когда угодно.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Just as they were placing the pudding in the refrigerator to cool,
            Violet, Klaus, and Sunny heard a loud, booming sound as the front
            door was flung open, and I'm sure I don't have to tell you who was
            home.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Поваренные вот тут, на восточной стенке.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Orphans?'' Count Olaf called out in his scratchy voice. ``Where
            are you, orphans?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Взглянем на них?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``In the kitchen, Count Olaf,'' Klaus called. ``We're just finishing
            dinner.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Да, – сказала Вайолет, – а потом, если вы не против, я бы ужасно
            хотела взглянуть на книги по машиностроению.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You'd better be,'' Count Olaf said, and strode into the kitchen.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Мой главный интерес в жизни – изобретение механических вещей.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He gazed at all three Baudelaire children with his shiny, shiny
            eyes. ``My troupe is right behind me and they are very hungry.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А я бы хотел поискать книги про волков, – добавил Клаус, –
            последнее время меня увлекает тема диких животных Северной Америки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Where is the roast beef?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Каги! – выкрикнула Солнышко, что означало: «Не забудьте взять для
            меня книгу с картинками!»
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``We didn't make roast beef,'' Violet said. ``We made puttanesca
            sauce.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Судья Штраус улыбнулась.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``What?'' Count Olaf asked. ``No roast beef?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Приятно встретить молодежь, которая так любит читать, – сказала
            она.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You didn't tell us you wanted roast beef,'' Klaus said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Но сперва, пожалуй, стоит поискать подходящий рецепт, как вам
            кажется?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf slid toward the children so that he looked even taller
            than he was.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Дети согласились с ней и полчаса изучали поваренные книги, которые
            отбирала для них судья Штраус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            His eyes grew even brighter, and his one eyebrow raised in anger.
            ``In agreeing to adopt you,'' he said, ``I have become your father,
            and as your father I am not someone to be trifled with.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            По правде говоря, дети пришли в такое возбуждение оттого, что вместо
            дома Графа Олафа оказались в этой уютной библиотеке, что никак не
            могли сосредоточиться на кулинарной теме.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I demand that you serve roast beef to myself and my guests.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Наконец Клаус нашел блюдо, которое показалось ему восхитительным и
            не требовало особых трудов.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``We don't have any!'' Violet cried. ``We made puttanesca sauce!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Послушайте-ка, – сказал он.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``No! No! No!'' Sunny shouted.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – «Путтанеска».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf looked down at Sunny, who had spoken so suddenly.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Итальянский соус для спагетти.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            With an inhuman roar he picked her up in one scraggly hand and
            raised her so she was staring at him in the eye.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Надо всего лишь потушить в масле оливки, каперсы, анчоусы, чеснок,
            нарубленную петрушку и томаты в кастрюльке и сварить отдельно
            макароны.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Needless to say, Sunny was very frightened and began crying
            immediately, too scared to even try to bite the hand that held her.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Как будто легко, – согласилась Вайолет, и бодлеровские дети
            обменялись взглядами.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Put her down immediately, you beast!'' Klaus shouted.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А вдруг благодаря соседству с доброй судьей Штраус и ее библиотекой
            им удастся устроить себе приятную жизнь с такой же легкостью, что и
            приготовить итальянский соус для Графа Олафа?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He jumped up, trying to rescue Sunny from the grasp of the Count,
            but he was holding her too high to reach.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Глава четвертая
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf looked down at Klaus and smiled a terrible, toothy grin,
            raising the wailing Sunny up even higher in the air.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Дети записали рецепт соуса на клочке бумаги, а судья Штраус была так
            добра, что сама отвела их на рынок и помогла купить необходимые
            продукты.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He seemed about to drop her to the floor when there was a large
            burst of laughter in the next room.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Денег Граф Олаф оставил им не очень-то много, но они сумели закупить
            все, что требовалось.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Olaf! Where's Olaf?'' voices called out.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            У одного уличного торговца они приобрели оливки, перепробовав все
            сорта и выбрав свои любимые.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf paused, still holding the wailing Sunny up in the air, as
            members of his theater troupe walked into the kitchen.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они высмотрели в лавочке макароны затейливой формы и разузнали у
            хозяйки, сколько их пойдет на тринадцать человек (десять гостей
            Графа Олафа и они трое).
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Soon they were crowding the room-an assortment of strange-looking
            characters of all shapes and sizes.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            И наконец, в супермаркете они купили чеснок – луковичное растение с
            острым вкусом; анчоусы – маленькие соленые рыбешки; каперсы – бутоны
            цветков ползучего кустарника с удивительным вкусом; и помидоры,
            которые на самом-то деле не овощи, как считает большинство людей, а
            фрукты.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            There was a bald man with a very long nose, dressed in a long black
            robe.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Детям пришло в голову, что уместно было бы приготовить десерт, и они
            добавили несколько пакетиков с пудинговой смесью.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            There were two women who had bright white powder all over their
            faces, making them look like ghosts.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А вдруг, если они приготовят вкусный обед, Граф Олаф немного
            подобреет?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Behind the women was a man with very long and skinny arms, at the
            end of which were two hooks instead of hands.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Спасибо вам огромное за то, что помогли нам с покупками, – сказала
            Вайолет, когда они все вместе возвращались домой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            There was a person who was extremely fat, and who looked like
            neither a man nor a woman.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Не знаю, что бы мы без вас делали.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            And behind this person, standing in the doorway, were an assortment
            of people the children could not see but who promised to be just as
            frightening.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вы мне кажетесь весьма сообразительными молодыми людьми, –
            ответила судья Штраус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Here you are, Olaf,'' said one of the white-faced women. ``What in
            the world are you doing?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Полагаю, вы бы и сами что-нибудь да придумали.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I'm just disciplining these orphans,'' Count Olaf said. ``I asked
            them to make dinner, and all they have made is some disgusting
            sauce.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но меня по-прежнему удивляет, что Граф Олаф велел вам приготовить
            такой огромный обед.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You can't go easy on children,'' the man with the hook-hands said.
            ``They must be taught to obey their elders.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Ну вот мы и пришли.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The tall, bald man peered at the youngsters. ``Are these,'' he said
            to Count Olaf, ``those wealthy children you were telling me about?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Пойду разбирать свои покупки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Yes,'' Count Olaf said. ``They are so awful I can scarcely stand
            to touch them.'' With that, he lowered Sunny, who was still wailing,
            to the floor.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Надеюсь, вы скоро опять придете и возьмете у меня книжки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet and Klaus breathed a sigh of relief that he had not dropped
            her from that great height.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Завтра? – быстро отозвался Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I don't blame you,'' said someone in the doorway.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Можно, мы придем завтра?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf rubbed his hands together as if he had been holding
            something revolting instead of an infant. ``Well, enough talk,'' he
            said. ``I suppose we will eat their dinner, even though it is all
            wrong.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Почему бы и нет? – Судья Штраус улыбнулась.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Everyone, follow me to the dining room and I will pour us some wine.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я и выразить не могу, как мы ценим ваше приглашение, – произнесла
            Вайолет, старательно подбирая слова.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Perhaps by the time these brats serve us, we will be too drunk to
            care if it is roast beef or not.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С тех пор как их добрые родители умерли, а Граф Олаф так мерзко с
            ними обходился, дети отвыкли от доброго обращения и теперь не знали
            – должны ли они как-то отплатить за это.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Hurrah!'' cried several members of the troupe, and they marched
            through the kitchen, following Count Olaf into the dining room.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Завтра, до того как выбирать книги, мы с Клаусом с радостью
            поможем вам по хозяйству.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Nobody paid a bit of attention to the children, except for the bald
            man, who stopped and stared Violet in the eye.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Солнышко, правда, слишком мала для работы, но мы и для нее
            что-нибудь придумаем.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You're a pretty one,'' he said, taking her face in his rough
            hands. ``If I were you I would try not to anger Count Olaf, or he
            might wreck that pretty little face of yours.'' Violet shuddered,
            and the bald man gave a high-pitched giggle and left the room.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Судья Штраус улыбнулась всем троим, но глаза ее оставались
            печальными.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The Baudelaire children, alone in the kitchen, found themselves
            breathing heavily, as if they had just run a long distance.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Она положила руку Вайолет на голову, и впервые за последнее время
            Вайолет стало спокойнее на душе.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Sunny continued to wail, and Klaus found that his eyes were wet with
            tears as well.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Это не обязательно, – сказала судья Штраус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Only Violet didn't cry, but merely trembled with fear and revulsion,
            a word which here means ``an unpleasant mixture of horror and
            disgust.'' For several moments none of them could speak.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я всегда буду рада видеть вас у себя.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``This is terrible, terrible,'' Klaus said finally. ``Violet, what
            can we do?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С этими словами она повернулась и исчезла в дверях.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I don't know,'' she said. ``I'm afraid.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А бодлеровские сироты, поглядев с минуту ей вслед, вошли в свой дом.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Me too,'' Klaus said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Почти всю вторую половину дня Вайолет, Клаус и Солнышко готовили
            соус соответственно рецепту.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Hux!'' Sunny said, as she stopped crying.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет прожарила в масле чеснок и накрошила анчоусы, Клаус очистил
            от кожицы помидоры и вынул косточки из оливок.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Let's have some dinner!'' someone shouted from the dining room,
            and the theater troupe began pounding on the table in strict rhythm,
            which is an exceedingly rude thing to do.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Солнышко колотила по кастрюле деревянной ложкой, распевая довольно
            монотонную песенку, которую сочинила сама.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``We'd better serve the puttanesca,'' Klaus said, ``or who knows
            what Count Olaf will do to us.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            И все трое почувствовали себя уже не такими несчастными, как все то
            время, что они жили у Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet thought of what the bald man had said, about wrecking her
            face, and nodded.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Запахи готовящейся пищи часто действуют успокоительно, и в кухне
            делалось все уютнее по мере того, как соус с бульканьем томился на
            плите, что на кулинарном языке означает «кипел на медленном огне».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The two of them looked at the pot of bubbling sauce, which had
            seemed so cozy while they were making it and now looked like a vat
            of blood.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Дети вспоминали разные приятные события из своей жизни с родителями,
            говорили о судье Штраус, которую дружно признали замечательной
            соседкой, и мечтали о том, как много времени будут проводить в ее
            библиотеке.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Then, leaving Sunny behind in the kitchen, they walked into the
            dining room, Klaus carrying a bowl of the interestingly shaped
            noodles and Violet carrying the pot of puttanesca sauce and a large
            ladle with which to serve it.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Разговаривая, они помешивали и пробовали шоколадный пудинг.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The theater troupe was talking and cackling, drinking again and
            again from their wine cups and paying no attention to the Baudelaire
            orphans as they circled the table serving everyone dinner.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            В тот момент, когда они ставили пудинг в холодильник, чтобы
            остудить, все трое услышали, как дверь с гулким грохотом
            распахнулась… и думаю, мне не нужно объяснять, кто вернулся домой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet's right hand ached from holding the heavy ladle.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Сироты! – заорал Граф Олаф.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She thought of switching to her left hand, but because she was
            right-handed she was afraid she might spill the sauce with her left
            hand, which could enrage Count Olaf again.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Эй, сироты! Где вы?!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She stared miserably at Olaf's plate of food and found herself
            wishing she had bought poison at the market and put it in the
            puttanesca sauce.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – На кухне, Граф Олаф! – отозвался Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Finally, they were through serving, and Klaus and Violet slipped
            back into the kitchen.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Обед почти готов.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            They listened to the wild, rough laughter of Count Olaf and his
            theater troupe, and they picked at their own portions of food, too
            miserable to eat.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Советую поторопиться.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Before long, Olaf's friends were pounding on the table in strict
            rhythm again, and the orphans went out to the dining room to clear
            the table, and then again to serve the chocolate pudding.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Граф Олаф вошел в кухню и уставил на них взгляд своих
            неестественно блестящих глаз.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            By now it was obvious that Count Olaf and his associates had drunk a
            great deal of wine, and they slouched at the table and spoke much
            less.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Моя труппа будет вот-вот, и они очень голодны.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Finally, they roused themselves, and trooped back through the
            kitchen, scarcely glancing at the children on their way out of the
            house.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А где ростбиф?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf looked around the room, which was filled with dirty
            dishes.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мы не делали ростбифа, – сказала Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Because you haven't cleaned up yet,'' he said to the orphans, ``I
            suppose you can be excused from attending tonight's performance.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мы приготовили соус «путтанеска».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But after cleaning up, you are to go straight to your beds.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Как? Нет ростбифа?!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus had been glaring at the floor, trying to hide how upset he
            was.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вы не написали, что хотите именно ростбиф,– возразил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But at this he could not remain silent. ``You mean our bed!'' he
            shouted. ``You have only provided us with one bed!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф одним движением скользнул в их сторону и сейчас, вблизи,
            показался им еще выше.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Members of the theater troupe stopped in their tracks at this
            outburst, and glanced from Klaus to Count Olaf to see what would
            happen next.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Глаза его заблестели еще сильнее, от гнева бровь с одной стороны
            задралась кверху.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf raised his one eyebrow, and his eyes shone bright, but he
            spoke calmly.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Согласившись усыновить вас, – прошипел он, – я стал вашим отцом и
            как отец не потерплю непослушания.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``If you would like another bed,'' he said, ``tomorrow you may go
            into town and purchase one.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Я требую, чтобы вы подали мне и моим гостям ростбиф!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You know perfectly well we haven't any money,'' Klaus said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
