            – Но у нас его нет! – выкрикнула Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Of course you do,'' Count Olaf said, and his voice began to get a
            little louder. ``You are the inheritors of an enormous fortune.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мы сделали соус!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``That money,'' Klaus said, remembering what Mr. Poe said, ``is not
            to be used until Violet is of age.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Нет! Нет! Нет! – прокричала Солнышко.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf's face grew very red.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф перевел взгляд вниз, на Солнышко, которая так неожиданно
            издала осмысленные звуки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            For a moment he said nothing.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С каким-то нечеловеческим ревом он схватил ее костлявой рукой и
            поднял вверх, так что она очутилась на уровне его глаз.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Then, in one sudden movement, he reached down and struck Klaus
            across the face.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Нечего и говорить, она так перепугалась, что тут же заплакала и даже
            не попыталась укусить державшую ее руку.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus fell to the floor, his face inches from the eye tattooed on
            Olaf's ankle.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Немедленно отпусти ее, гад! – закричал Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            His glasses leaped from his face and skittered into a corner.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он подпрыгнул, пытаясь вырвать девочку из графской лапы, но тот
            держал ее так высоко, что Клаусу было не достать.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            His left cheek, where Olaf had struck him, felt as if it were on
            fire.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф взглянул с высоты своего роста на Клауса и улыбнулся
            отвратительной улыбкой, обнажив все зубы.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The theater troupe laughed, and a few of them applauded as if Count
            Olaf had done something very brave instead of something despicable.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он поднял плачущую Солнышко еще выше, и казалось, вот-вот разожмет
            пальцы, но тут в соседней комнате раздался взрыв смеха.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Come on, friends,'' Count Olaf said to his comrades. ``We'll be
            late for our own performance.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Олаф! Где Олаф?! – послышались голоса.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``If I know you, Olaf,'' said the man with the hook-hands, ``you'll
            figure out a way to get at that Baudelaire money.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф помедлил, продолжая держать девочку на вытянутой вверх
            руке, а тем временем члены труппы начали стекаться в кухню.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``We'll see,'' Count Olaf said, but his eyes were shining bright as
            if he already had an idea.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вскоре они совсем заполонили ее – сборище личностей самого странного
            вида, разного роста и конфигурации.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            There was another loud boom as the front door shut behind Count Olaf
            and his terrible friends, and the Baudelaire children were alone in
            the kitchen.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Лысый человек с очень длинным носом, одетый в длинный черный
            балахон.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet knelt at Klaus's side, giving him a hug to try to make him
            feel better.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Две женщины, чьи лица, покрытые ярко-белой пудрой, делали их
            похожими на привидения.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Sunny crawled over to his glasses, picked them up, and brought them
            to him.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вслед за женщинами показался человек с очень длинными тощими руками,
            которые оканчивались крюками вместо пальцев.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus began to sob, not so much from the pain but from rage at the
            terrible situation they were in.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Одно создание отличалось неимоверной толщиной, и даже не разобрать
            было – мужчина это или женщина.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet and Sunny cried with him, and they continued weeping as they
            washed the dishes, and as they blew out the candles in the dining
            room, and as they changed out of their clothes and lay down to go to
            sleep, Klaus in the bed, Violet on the floor, Sunny on her little
            cushion of curtains.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А позади в дверях маячили какие-то не менее страшные фигуры.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The moonlight shone through the window, and if anyone had looked
            into the Baudelaire orphans' bedroom, they would have seen three
            children crying quietly all night long.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А-а-а, ты тут, Олаф! – воскликнула одна из женщин с белым лицом.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Chapter Five
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Что это ты делаешь?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Unless you have been very, very lucky, you have undoubtedly
            experienced events in your life that have made you cry.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Да просто призываю к порядку своих сирот, – отозвался Граф Олаф.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            So unless you have been very, very lucky, you know that a good, long
            session of weeping can often make you feel better, even if your
            circumstances have not changed one bit.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я им велел приготовить обед, а они сделали только омерзительный
            соус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            So it was with the Baudelaire orphans.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Правильно, детей нельзя баловать,– поддакнул человек с крюками
            вместо рук.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Having cried all night, they rose the next morning feeling as if a
            weight were off their shoulders.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Их надо научить слушаться старших.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The three children knew, of course, that they were still in a
            terrible situation, but they thought they might do something to make
            it better.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Длинный лысый тип уставился на детей:
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The morning's note from Count Olaf ordered them to chop firewood in
            the backyard, and as Violet and Klaus swung the axe down over each
            log to break it into smaller pieces, they discussed possible plans
            of action, while Sunny chewed meditatively on a small piece of wood.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Это те богатые дети, про которых ты мне рассказывал?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Clearly,'' Klaus said, fingering the ugly bruise on his face where
            Olaf had struck him, ``we cannot stay here any longer.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Да,– ответил Граф Олаф.– Они такие противные, что я до них
            дотронуться не могу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I would rather take my chances on the streets than live in this
            terrible place.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С этими словами он опустил все еще хнычущую Солнышко на пол, и
            Вайолет с Клаусом вздохнули с облегчением, радуясь, что он не уронил
            ее с такой высоты.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``But who knows what misfortunes would befall us on the streets?''
            Violet pointed out. ``At least here we have a roof over our heads.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – И я тебя ничуть не виню за это, – проговорил кто-то в дверях.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I wish our parents' money could be used now, instead of when you
            come of age,'' Klaus said. ``Then we could buy a castle and live in
            it, with armed guards patrolling the outside to keep out Count Olaf
            and his troupe.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф хорошенько обтер ладони одна об другую, как будто держал
            до сих пор не маленькую девочку, а что-то отвратительное.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``And I could have a large inventing studio,'' Violet said
            wistfully.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Ладно, хватит разговоров,– сказал он.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She swung the axe down and split a log neatly in two. ``Filled with
            gears and pulleys and wires and an elaborate computer system.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Наверное, мы все-таки съедим их обед, хоть он и никуда не годится.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``And I could have a large library,'' Klaus said, ``as comfortable
            as Justice Strauss's, but more enormous.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Все за мной в столовую! Сейчас выпьем вина, и когда эти щенки
            подадут свою стряпню, нам уже будет наплевать – ростбиф это или не
            ростбиф.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Gibbo!'' Sunny shrieked, which appeared to mean ``And I could have
            lots of things to bite.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Урра! – заорали несколько человек, и труппа двинулась из кухни
            вслед за Графом Олафом.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``But in the meantime,'' Violet said, ``we have to do something
            about our predicament.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            На детей никто и не смотрел, кроме лысого.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Perhaps Justice Strauss could adopt us,'' Klaus said. ``She said
            we were always welcome in her home.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Тот задержался и пристально поглядел Вайолет в глаза.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``But she meant for a visit, or to use her library,'' Violet pointed
            out. ``She didn't mean to live.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Недурна,– сказал он, взяв ее за подбородок шершавыми пальцами.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Perhaps if we explained our situation to her, she would agree to
            adopt us,'' Klaus said hopefully, but when Violet looked at him she
            saw that he knew it was of no use.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я бы на твоем месте постарался не сердить Графа Олафа, а то ведь
            он может испортить твою смазливую мордашку.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Adoption is an enormous decision, and not likely to happen
            impulsively.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет содрогнулась, а лысый с визгливым смехом последовал за
            остальными.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I'm sure you, in your life, have occasionally wished to be raised by
            different people than the ones who are raising you, but knew in your
            heart that the chances of this were very slim.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Бодлеровские дети остались на кухне одни.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I think we should go see Mr. Poe,'' Violet said. ``He told us when
            he dropped us here that we could contact him at the bank if we had
            any questions.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они тяжело дышали, как будто только что пробежали большое
            расстояние.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``We don't really have a question,'' Klaus said. ``We have a
            complaint.'' He was thinking of Mr. Poe walking toward them at Briny
            Beach, with his terrible message.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Солнышко продолжала хныкать, а Клаус вдруг обнаружил, что и у него
            глаза на мокром месте.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Even though the fire was of course not Mr. Poe's fault, Klaus was
            reluctant to see Mr. Poe because he was afraid of getting more bad
            news.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Не плакала только Вайолет, но она дрожала от страха и омерзения (что
            означает «неприятная смесь страха и отвращения»).
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I can't think of anyone else to contact,'' Violet said. ``Mr. Poe
            is in charge of our affairs, and I'm sure if he knew how horrid
            Count Olaf is, he would take us right out of here.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Несколько секунд они не могли произнести ни слова.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus pictured Mr. Poe arriving in his car and putting the
            Baudelaire orphans inside, to go somewhere else, and felt a stirring
            of hope.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Какой ужас, – наконец выдавил из себя Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Anywhere would be better than here.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Что мы будем делать, Вайолет?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Okay,'' he said. ``Let's get this firewood all chopped and we'll
            go to the bank.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Не знаю, – ответила она.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Invigorated by their plan, the Baudelaire orphans swung their axes
            at an amazing speed, and soon enough they were done chopping
            firewood and ready to go to the bank.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я боюсь.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            They remembered Count Olaf saying he had a map of the city, and they
            looked thoroughly for it, but they couldn't find any trace of a map,
            and decided it must be in the tower, where they were forbidden to
            go.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я тоже.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            So, without directions of any sort, the Baudelaire children set off
            for the city's banking district in hopes of finding Mr. Poe.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Бу-у-у! – выкрикнула вдруг Солнышко, перестав плакать.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            After walking through the meat district, the flower district, and
            the sculpture district, the three children arrived at the banking
            district, pausing to take a refreshing sip of water at the Fountain
            of Victorious Finance.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Обед давайте! – заорали из столовой, и члены труппы принялись
            ритмично, все враз, колотить по столу, что, как известно, в высшей
            степени невоспитанно.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The banking district consisted of several wide streets with large
            marble buildings on each side of them, all banks.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Несем скорей путтанеску, – решил Клаус, – а то неизвестно, что
            Граф Олаф с нами сделает.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            They went first to Trustworthy Bank, and then to Faithful Savings
            and Loan, and then to Subservient Financial Services, each time
            inquiring for Mr. Poe.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет вспомнила, что сказал ей лысый, и кивнула.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Finally, a receptionist at Subservient said she knew that Mr. Poe
            worked down the street, at Mulctuary Money Management.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они посмотрели на кастрюлю с кипящим соусом: пока они его готовили,
            он выглядел таким симпатичным, но сейчас им померещилось, что перед
            ними чан с кровью.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The building was square and rather plain-looking, though once
            inside, the three orphans were intimidated by the hustle and bustle
            of the people as they raced around the large, echoey room.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Оставив Солнышко в кухне, они вошли в столовую.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Finally, they asked a uniformed guard whether they had arrived at
            the right place to speak to Mr. Poe, and he led them into a large
            office with many file cabinets and no windows.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус нес миску с макаронами затейливой формы, а Вайолет –
            кастрюльку с соусом и большую разливательную ложку.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Why, hello,'' said Mr. Poe, in a puzzled tone of voice.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Актеры болтали и гоготали, не переставая пили вино и никакого
            внимания не обращали на бодлеровских детей, когда те обходили стол и
            накладывали им по очереди еду.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He was sitting at a desk covered in typed papers that looked
            important and boring.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            У Вайолет даже заболела правая рука, так она устала держать тяжелую
            поварешку.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Surrounding a small framed photograph of his wife and his two
            beastly sons were three telephones with flashing lights. ``Please
            come in.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Она подумала, не переложить ли ей ложку в левую руку, но из-за того,
            что была правшой, побоялась, что левой прольет соус и опять обозлит
            Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Thank you,'' said Klaus, shaking Mr. Poe's hand.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Глядя в отчаянии на полную тарелку Графа Олафа, она вдруг пожалела,
            что не купила на рынке яду и не положила его в соус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The Baudelaire youngsters sat down in three large and comfortable
            chairs.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Наконец они всех обслужили и улизнули на кухню.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Mr. Poe opened his mouth to speak, but had to cough into a
            handkerchief before he could begin. ``I'm very busy today,'' he said
            finally. ``So I don't have too much time to chat.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они слушали, как дико, грубыми голосами гогочут Граф Олаф и его
            гости, и без всякого аппетита ковыряли макароны в своих тарелках.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Next time you should call ahead of time when you plan on being in
            the neighborhood, and I will put some time aside to take you to
            lunch.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они чувствовали себя такими несчастными, что им не хотелось есть.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``That would be very pleasant,'' Violet said, ``and we're sorry we
            didn't contact you before we stopped by, but we find ourselves in an
            urgent situation.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вскоре олафовские друзья снова принялись ритмично колотить по столу,
            и дети пошли в столовую убирать со стола, а после подали шоколадный
            пудинг.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Count Olaf is a madman,'' Klaus said, getting right to the point.
            ``We cannot stay with him.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Очевидно было, что Граф Олаф с актерами изрядно напились, и теперь
            они сидели, обмякнув и навалившись на стол, и гораздо меньше
            болтали.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``He struck Klaus across the face.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Под конец они с трудом поднялись и всей гурьбой прошествовали через
            кухню к выходу, даже не обернувшись.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            See his bruise?'' Violet said, but just as she said it, one of the
            telephones rang, in a loud, unpleasant wail. ``Excuse me,'' Mr. Poe
            said, and picked up the phone. ``Poe here,'' he said into the
            receiver. ``What? Yes.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф оглядел кухню, уставленную грязной посудой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">Yes.</td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Поскольку вы еще не удосужились вымыть посуду, – сказал он, –
            сегодня вы освобождаетесь от присутствия на спектакле.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">Yes.</td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но зато после уборки – чтоб сразу по кроватям.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">Yes.</td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус все это время стоял, опустив глаза, чтобы не выдать своего
            возбуждения, но тут не сдержался.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">No.</td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вы хотите сказать – сразу в кровать! – закричал он.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">Yes.</td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вы нам дали одну кровать на троих!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Thank you.'' He hung up the phone and looked at the Baudelaires as
            if he had forgotten they were there.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Театральные гости при этой вспышке застыли на месте и только
            переводили взгляд с Клауса на Графа Олафа, выжидая, что за этим
            последует.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I'm sorry,'' Mr. Poe said, ``what were we talking about? Oh, yes,
            Count Olaf.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф вздернул бровь, в глазах его появился особый блеск, но
            голос был спокоен.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I'm sorry you don't have a good first impression of him.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Хотите еще одну кровать – идите завтра в город и купите.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``He has only provided us with one bed,'' Klaus said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вы отлично знаете, что у нас нет денег, – возразил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``He makes us do a great many difficult chores.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Нет, есть.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``He drinks too much wine.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Граф Олаф повысил голос.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Excuse me,'' Mr. Poe said, as another telephone rang. ``Poe
            here,'' he said. ``Seven.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вы унаследовали огромное состояние.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Seven.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус вспомнил, что говорил мистер По:
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Seven.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Но этими деньгами нельзя пользоваться, пока Вайолет не достигнет
            совершеннолетия.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Seven.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф побагровел.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Six and a half.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Какую-то секунду он молчал.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Seven.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А затем одним молниеносным движением нагнулся и ударил Клауса по
            лицу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            You're welcome.'' He hung up and quickly wrote something down on one
            of his papers, then looked at the children. ``I'm sorry,'' he said,
            ``what were you saying about Count Olaf? Making you do chores
            doesn't sound too bad.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус упал и увидел прямо перед собой глаз, вытатуированный на
            щиколотке у Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``He calls us orphans.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Очки у Клауса соскочили с носа и отлетели в угол комнаты.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``He has terrible friends.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Левая щека, по которой ударил Граф Олаф, горела.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``He is always asking about our money.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Актеры захохотали, а некоторые зааплодировали, как будто Граф Олаф
            совершил невесть какой доблестный, а не достойный презрения
            поступок.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Poko!'' (This was from Sunny.)
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Пошли, друзья, – скомандовал Олаф, – а то опоздаем на собственный
            спектакль.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Mr. Poe put up his hands to indicate he had heard enough.
            ``Children, children,'' he said. ``You must give yourselves time to
            adjust to your new home.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Насколько я тебя знаю, Олаф, – проговорил человек с крюками, – уж
            ты что-нибудь придумаешь, чтоб добраться до бодлеровских денежек.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            You've only been there a few days.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Поглядим, – только и ответил Граф Олаф, но глаза его вновь
            загорелись тем особым блеском, что стало ясно – у него уже родилась
            какая-то идея.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``We have been there long enough to know Count Olaf is a bad man,''
            Klaus said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С грохотом захлопнулась входная дверь за Олафом и его жуткими
            друзьями, и дети остались на кухне одни.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Mr. Poe sighed, and looked at each of the three children.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет опустилась на колени и крепко обняла Клауса, чтобы
            подбодрить его.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            His face was kind, but it didn't look like he really believed what
            the Baudelaire orphans were saying. ``Are you familiar with the
            Latin term ``in loco parentis''?'' he asked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Солнышко сползала за очками и подала их ему.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet and Sunny looked at Klaus.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус заплакал, правда не столько от боли, сколько от бессильной
            ярости при мысли об их ужасном положении.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The biggest reader of the three, he was the most likely to know
            vocabulary words and foreign phrases. ``Something about trains?'' he
            asked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет и Солнышко тоже залились слезами и плакали все то время, что
            мыли посуду, тушили свечи в столовой, раздевались и укладывались
            спать – Клаус на кровати, Вайолет на полу, а Солнышко на подушке из
            занавески.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Maybe Mr. Poe was going to take them by train to another relative.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Светила луна, и если бы кто-то заглянул снаружи в окно спальни, то
            увидел бы троих детей, тихонько плакавших всю ночь напролет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Mr. Poe shook his head. `` ``In loco parentis'' means ``acting in
            the role of parent,'' '' he said. ``It is a legal term and it
            applies to Count Olaf.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Глава пятая
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Now that you are in his care, the Count may raise you using any
            methods he sees fit.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Если только вас всю жизнь не сопровождало какое-то особое везение,
            вам наверняка приходилось хоть раз испытывать что-то такое, что
            заставляло вас плакать.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            I'm sorry if your parents did not make you do any household chores,
            or if you never saw them drink any wine, or if you like their
            friends better than Count Olaf's friends, but these are things that
            you must get used to, as Count Olaf is acting in loco parentis.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            И если только не то же особое везение, вы знаете: если поплакать
            подольше и послаще, это поможет и вы почувствуете себя гораздо
            лучше, даже когда обстоятельства нисколечко не изменились.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Understand?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Так было и с бодлеровскими сиротами.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``But he struck my brother!'' Violet said. ``Look at his face!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Проплакав всю ночь, наутро они почувствовали, будто какая-то тяжесть
            свалилась у них с плеч.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            As Violet spoke, Mr. Poe reached into his pocket for his
            handkerchief and, covering his mouth, coughed many, many times into
            it.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Разумеется, дети понимали, что положение их остается ужасным, но им
            показалось, что они способны его поправить.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
