          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А может, Граф Олаф ничего такого не замышляет? Играть в его пьесе
            мне неохота, но, возможно, мы с тобой зря волнуемся? А вдруг Граф
            Олаф в самом деле пытается приучить нас к дому?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            We'll do anything, anything, just don't harm her.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Как ты можешь так говорить? – возмутился Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Anything?'' Count Olaf asked, his eyebrow rising.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Ведь он ударил меня по лицу!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He leaned in toward Violet and gazed into her eyes. ``Anything?
            Would you, for instance, consider marrying me during tomorrow
            night's performance?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Но каким образом он захватит наше состояние, если просто возьмет
            нас играть в спектакле? – сказала Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet stared at him.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – У меня глаза уже устали читать книги, все равно толку никакого.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She had an odd feeling in her stomach, as if she were the one being
            thrown from a great height.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Я иду помогать судье Штраус в саду.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The really frightening thing about Olaf, she realized, was that he
            was very smart after all.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус смотрел вслед сестре, и им овладевало чувство безнадежности.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He wasn't merely an unsavory drunken brute, but an unsavory, clever
            drunken brute.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            До спектакля остались считанные дни, а он до сих пор не разгадал
            замыслов Графа Олаф а и тем более не придумал, как ему помешать.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``While you were busy reading books and making accusations,'' Count
            Olaf said, ``I had one of my quietest, sneakiest assistants skulk
            into your bedroom and steal little Sunny away.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            До сих пор Клаус был убежден, что если будешь читать много книг, то
            сумеешь разрешить любую проблему.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She is perfectly safe, for now.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Сейчас он не так был в этом уверен.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But I consider her to be a stick behind a stubborn mule.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Эй, вы! – раздался голос у двери и разом вывел Клауса из
            задумчивости.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Our sister is not a stick,'' Klaus said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Меня послал за вами Граф Олаф.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``A stubborn mule,'' Count Olaf explained, ``does not move in the
            direction its owner wants it to.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вы должны немедленно вернуться домой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            In that way, it is like you children, who insist on mucking up my
            plans.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус повернул голову и увидел в дверях одного из членов олафовской
            труппы – того, что с крюками.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Any animal owner will tell you that a stubborn mule will move in the
            proper direction if there is a carrot in front of it, and a stick
            behind it.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Что ты тут в этой затхлой конуре делаешь? – произнес он скрипучим
            голосом и подошел к сидевшему на стуле Клаусу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            It will move toward the carrot, because it wants the reward of food,
            and away from the stick, because it does not want the punishment of
            pain.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Прищурив свои маленькие глазки, он прочел заглавие одной из книг:
            «Закон наследования и его истолкование».– Зачем ты ее читаешь? –
            спросил он резко.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Likewise, you will do what I say, to avoid the punishment of the
            loss of your sister, and because you want the reward of surviving
            this experience.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А вы как думаете – зачем? – огрызнулся Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Now, Violet, let me ask you again: will you marry me?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Сейчас я тебе скажу, что думаю.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet swallowed, and looked down at Count Olaf's tattoo.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Крюкастый положил один из крюков Клаусу на плечо.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She could not bring herself to answer.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я думаю, тебя больше нельзя пускать сюда в библиотеку, во всяком
            случае до пятницы.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Come now,'' Count Olaf said, his voice faking-a word which here
            means ``feigning''-kindness.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Нам ни к чему, чтоб такой малявка, как ты, набрался ненужных идей.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He reached out a hand and stroked Violet's hair. ``Would it be so
            terrible to be my bride, to live in my house for the rest of your
            life? You're such a lovely girl, after the marriage I wouldn't
            dispose of you like your brother and sister.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Говори, где твоя сестра и эта маленькая паршивка?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet imagined sleeping beside Count Olaf, and waking up each
            morning to look at this terrible man.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – В саду.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She pictured wandering around the house, trying to avoid him all
            day, and cooking for his terrible friends at night, perhaps every
            night, for the rest of her life.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Клаус стряхнул с плеча крюк.– Идите за ними сами.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But then she looked up at her helpless sister and knew what her
            answer must be. ``If you let Sunny go,'' she said finally, ``I will
            marry you.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Актер нагнулся так близко, что черты его лица расплылись у Клауса
            перед глазами.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I will let Sunny go,'' Count Olaf answered, ``after tomorrow
            night's performance.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Слушай меня внимательно, малявка.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            In the meantime, she will remain in the tower for safekeeping.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Каждое слово вырывалось у него вместе с вонючим дыханием.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            And, as a warning, I will tell you that my assistants will stand
            guard at the door to the tower staircase, in case you were getting
            any ideas.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Единственно, почему Граф Олаф не разорвал вас на куски, так это
            потому, что еще не заполучил ваши денежки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You're a terrible man,'' Klaus spat out, but Count Olaf merely
            smiled again.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он оставляет вас в живых, пока не приведет в исполнение свой план.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I may be a terrible man,'' Count Olaf said, ``but I have been able
            to concoct a foolproof way of getting your fortune, which is more
            than you've been able to do.'' With that, he began to stride toward
            the house. ``Remember that, orphans,'' he said. ``You may have read
            more books than I have, but it didn't help you gain the upper hand
            in this situation.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но задай себе вопрос, книжный червяк: какой ему смысл сохранять вам
            жизнь после того, как он отберет у вас деньги? Что произойдет с вами
            тогда, как ты думаешь?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Now, give me that book which gave you such grand ideas, and do the
            chores assigned to you.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Ледяные мурашки побежали у Клауса по всему телу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus sighed, and relinquished-a word which here means ``gave to
            Count Olaf even though he didn't want to''-the book on nuptial law.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Никогда в жизни он еще не испытывал такого страха.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He began to follow Count Olaf into the house, but Violet stayed
            still as a statue.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Руки и ноги у него затряслись, как в припадке.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She hadn't been listening to that last speech of Count Olaf's,
            knowing it would be full of the usual self-congratulatory nonsense
            and despicable insults.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Губы не повиновались, и он издавал какие-то непонятные звуки вроде
            тех, что издавала Солнышко.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She was staring at the tower, not at the top, where her sister was
            dangling, but the whole length of it.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А-а-а, – выдавил он из себя, – а-а-а…
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus looked back at her and saw something he hadn't seen in quite
            some time.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Когда наступит час, – произнес крюкастый ровным голосом, не
            обращая внимания на попытки Клауса, – Граф Олаф скорее всего отдаст
            тебя мне.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            To those who hadn't been around Violet long, nothing would have
            seemed unusual, but those who knew her well knew that when she tied
            her hair up in a ribbon to keep it out of her eyes, it meant that
            the gears and levers of her inventing brain were whirring at top
            speed.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Так что на твоем месте я бы вел себя повежливее.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Chapter Ten
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Он распрямился и поднес свои крюки к самому лицу Клауса, свет от
            лампы падал теперь прямо на зловещие приспособления.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            That night, Klaus was the Baudelaire orphan sleeping fitfully in the
            bed, and Violet was the Baudelaire orphan staying up, working by the
            light of the moon.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А сейчас, извини, я пошел за двумя другими сиротками.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            All day, the two siblings had wandered around the house, doing the
            assigned chores and scarcely speaking to each other.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он вышел, и Клаус почувствовал, как обмякло все его тело.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus was too tired and despondent to speak, and Violet was holed up
            in the inventing area of her mind, too busy planning to talk.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Ему захотелось посидеть и отдышаться.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            When night approached, Violet gathered up the curtains that had been
            Sunny's bed and brought them to the door to the tower stairs, where
            the enormous assistant of Count Olaf's, the one who looked like
            neither a man nor a woman, was standing guard.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но разум не позволил ему медлить.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet asked whether she could bring the blankets to her sister, to
            make her more comfortable during the night.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Оставались последние минуты, чтобы побыть в библиотеке, и, возможно,
            последний шанс, чтобы сорвать планы Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The enormous creature merely looked at Violet with its blank white
            eyes and shook its head, then dismissed her with a silent gesture.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но что делать? Прислушиваясь к тихим звукам разговора крюкастого с
            судьей Штраус, доносившимся из сада, Клаус отчаянно шарил взглядом
            по полкам, ища что-нибудь полезное.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet knew, of course, that Sunny was too terrified to be comforted
            by a handful of draperies, but she hoped that she would be allowed a
            few moments to hold her and tell her that everything would turn out
            all right.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Наконец, когда к двери уже приближались шаги, Клаус высмотрел одну
            книгу и быстро схватил ее.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Also, she wanted to do something known in the crime industry as
            ``casing the joint.'' ``Casing the joint'' means observing a
            particular location in order to formulate a plan.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Едва он успел сунуть ее себе за пазуху и заправить спереди рубашку,
            как крюкастый вошел в библиотеку, конвоируя Вайолет и неся Солнышко,
            которая безуспешно пыталась кусать его крюки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            For instance, if you are a bank robber-although I hope you
            aren't-you might go to the bank a few days before you planned to rob
            it.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Иду, иду, – торопливо сказал Клаус и поскорее вышел из дома, чтобы
            актер не успел разглядеть его как следует.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Perhaps wearing a disguise, you would look around the bank and
            observe security guards, cameras, and other obstacles, so you could
            plan how to avoid capture or death during your burglary.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он быстро пошел впереди, надеясь, что никто не заметит у него
            спереди бугра под рубашкой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet, a law-abiding citizen, was not planning to rob a bank, but
            she was planning to rescue Sunny, and was hoping to catch a glimpse
            of the tower room in which her sister was being held prisoner, so as
            to make her plan more easily.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А вдруг книга, которую он несет тайком, спасет им жизнь?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But it appeared that she wasn't going to be able to case the joint
            after all.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Глава восьмая
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            This made Violet nervous as she sat on the floor by the window,
            working on her invention as quietly as she could.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус читал всю ночь напролет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet had very few materials with which to invent something, and
            she didn't want to wander around the house looking for more for fear
            of arousing the suspicions of Count Olaf and his troupe.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вообще-то он любил это делать.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But she had enough to build a rescuing device.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Раньше, когда родители были живы, Клаус обычно брал с собой в
            постель фонарик и, закрывшись с головой, читал, пока глаза у него не
            слипались.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Above the window was a sturdy metal rod from which the curtains had
            hung, and Violet took it down.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Бывало, что отец, придя утром будить Клауса, заставал его крепко
            спящим, с фонариком в одной руке и с книгой в другой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Using one of the rocks Olaf had left in a pile in the corner, she
            broke the curtain rod into two pieces.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но этой ночью обстоятельства, разумеется, были совсем другими.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She then bent each piece of the rod into several sharp angles,
            leaving tiny cuts on her hands as she did so.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус стоял у окна и при свете луны, прищурившись, читал похищенную
            книгу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Then Violet took down the painting of the eye.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Порой он бросал взгляд на сестер.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            On the back of the painting, as on the back of many paintings, was a
            small piece of wire to hang on the hook.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет спала прерывистым сном, иначе говоря беспокойно металась на
            бугристой постели, а Солнышко забралась поглубже в свое гнездо из
            занавески, так что все вместе выглядело как кучка тряпья.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She removed the wire and used it to connect the two pieces together.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус ничего не сказал сестрам про книгу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet had now made what looked like a large metal spider.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он не хотел подавать им ложную надежду, поскольку не был уверен, что
            книга поможет им выпутаться.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She then went over to the cardboard box and took out the ugliest of
            the clothes that Mrs.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Книга была длинная, читалась с трудом, и Клаус все больше уставал по
            мере того, как ночь шла.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Poe had purchased, the outfits the Baudelaire orphans would never
            wear no matter how desperate they were.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Иногда глаза у него сами собой закрывались.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Working quickly and quietly, she began to tear these into long,
            narrow strips, and to tie these strips together.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Порой он ловил себя на том, что читает и перечитывает одну и ту же
            фразу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Among Violet's many useful skills was a vast knowledge of different
            types of knots.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Читает и перечитывает.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The particular knot she was using was called the Devil's Tongue.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Читает и перечитывает.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            A group of female Finnish pirates invented it back in the fifteenth
            century, and named it the Devil's Tongue because it twisted this way
            and that, in a most complicated and eerie way.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но вдруг он вспоминал, как сверкали крюки у олафовского сообщника,
            ему представлялось, как они рвут его тело, тогда он мгновенно
            просыпался и читал дальше.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The Devil's Tongue was a very useful knot, and when Violet tied the
            cloth strips together, end to end, it formed a sort of rope.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он нашел небольшой обрывок бумаги, разорвал его на полоски и стал
            закладывать важные места.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            As she worked, she remembered something her parents had said to her
            when Klaus was born, and again when they brought Sunny home from the
            hospital. ``You are the eldest Baudelaire child,'' they had said,
            kindly but firmly. ``And as the eldest, it will always be your
            responsibility to look after your younger siblings.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            К тому времени как за окном чернота сделалась менее густой,
            предвещая скорый рассвет, Клаус знал уже все, что нужно было знать.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Promise us that you will always watch out for them and make sure
            they don't get into trouble.'' Violet remembered her promise, and
            thought of Klaus, whose bruised face still looked sore, and Sunny,
            dangling from the top of the tower like a flag, and began working
            faster.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С восходом солнца надежды его окрепли.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Even though Count Olaf was of course the cause of all this misery,
            Violet felt as if she had broken her promise to her parents, and
            vowed to make it right.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Наконец, когда послышались первые птичьи голоса, Клаус на цыпочках
            прокрался к двери и тихонько приоткрыл ее, стараясь не будить
            беспокойно спящую Вайолет и Солнышко, скрывающуюся в ворохе тряпок.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Eventually, using enough of the ugly clothing, Violet had a rope
            that was, she hoped, just over thirty feet long.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он прошел на кухню, сел и стал ждать Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She tied one end of it to the metal spider, and looked at her
            handiwork.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Долго ему ждать не пришлось – вскоре послышалось громыхание башмаков
            вниз по башенной лестнице.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            What she had made was called a grappling hook, which is something
            used for climbing up the sides of buildings, usually for a nefarious
            purpose.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф вошел в кухню и, увидев Клауса, сидящего за столом,
            оскалился, что в данном случае означало «улыбнулся фальшивой
            недружелюбной улыбкой».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Using the metal end to hook onto something at the top of the tower,
            and the rope to aid her climb, Violet hoped to reach the top of the
            tower, untie Sunny's cage, and climb back down.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Привет, сирота, – сказал он.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            This was, of course, a very risky plan, both because it was
            dangerous, and because she had made the grappling hook herself,
            instead of purchasing it at a store that sold such things.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Рано ты встал.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But a grappling hook was all Violet could think of to make without a
            proper inventing laboratory, and time was running short.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Сердце у Клауса забилось сильнее, но выглядел он хладнокровным, как
            будто снаружи его одевала невидимая броня.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She hadn't told Klaus about her plan, because she didn't want to
            give him false hope, so without waking him, she gathered up her
            grappling hook and tiptoed out of the room.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я не спал всю ночь, – сказал он.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Once outside, Violet realized her plan was even more difficult than
            she had thought.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я читал вот эту книгу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The night was quiet, which would mean she would have to make
            practically no noise at all.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Он выложил ее на стол.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The night also had a slight breeze, and when she pictured herself
            swinging in the breeze, clinging to a rope made of ugly clothing,
            she almost gave up entirely.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Она называется «Матримониальное право».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            And the night was dark, so it was hard to see where she could toss
            the grappling hook and have the metal arms hook onto something.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Из нее я узнал много интересного.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But, standing there shivering in her nightgown, Violet knew she had
            to try.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф достал уже бутылку вина, собираясь налить себе стаканчик
            перед завтраком, но, увидев книгу, отставил бутылку и сел.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Using her right hand, she threw the grappling hook as high and as
            hard as she could, and waited to see if it would catch onto
            something.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Слово «матримониальный», – продолжал Клаус, – означает «брачный».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Clang! The hook made a loud noise as it hit the tower, but it didn't
            stick to anything, and came crashing back down.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Без тебя знаю, что это слово значит, – прорычал Граф Олаф.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Her heart pounding, Violet stood stock-still, wondering if Count
            Olaf or one of his accomplices would come and investigate.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Где ты ее взял?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But nobody arrived after a few moments, and Violet, swinging the
            hook over her head like a lasso, tried again.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Нашел в библиотеке у судьи Штраус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Clang! Clang! The grappling hook hit the tower twice as it bounced
            back down to the ground.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но это неважно.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet waited again, listening for footsteps, but all she heard was
            her own terrified pulse.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А важно, что я разгадал ваши планы.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She decided to try one more time.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Вот как? – Бровь у Графа Олафа поползла кверху.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Clang! The grappling hook hit the tower, and fell down again,
            hitting Violet hard in the shoulder.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Ив чем же они состоят, недоросток ты этакий?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            One of the arms tore her nightgown and cut through her skin.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус игнорировал оскорбление и раскрыл книгу на одной из страниц с
            закладкой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Biting down on her hand to keep from crying out in pain, Violet felt
            the place in her shoulder where she had been struck, and it was wet
            with blood.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – «Брачные законы здесь очень просты, – прочел он вслух.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Her arm throbbed in pain.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Необходимые условия следующие: присутствие судьи, утверждение „да“
            со стороны невесты и жениха и подпись невесты на договоре той рукой,
            которой она обычно подписывает документы».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            At this point in the proceedings, if I were Violet, I would have
            given up, but just as she was about to turn around and go inside the
            house, she pictured how scared Sunny must be, and, ignoring the pain
            in her shoulder, Violet used her right hand to throw the hook again.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Клаус положил книгу на стол и выставил вперед палец.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Clang! The usual clang! sound stopped halfway through, and Violet
            saw in the dim light of the moon that the hook wasn't falling.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Если моя сестра скажет «да» и подпишет бумагу в присутствии судьи
            Штраус, она окажется в законном браке с вами.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Nervously, she gave the rope a good yank, and it stayed put.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вашу пьесу надо назвать не «Удивительная свадьба», а «Опасная
            свадьба».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The grappling hook had worked!
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Бы не в фигуральном смысле хотите жениться на Вайолет, а в
            буквальном! Свадьба эта не понарошку, а самая настоящая,
            накладывающая законные обязательства.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Her feet touching the side of the stone tower and her hands grasping
            the rope, Violet closed her eyes and began to climb.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф расхохотался грубым хриплым смехом:
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Never daring to look around, she pulled herself up the tower, hand
            over hand, all the time keeping in mind her promise to her parents
            and the horrible things Count Olaf would do if his villainous plan
            worked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Да ведь твоя сестра еще не достигла возраста, когда выходят замуж!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The evening wind blew harder and harder as she climbed higher and
            higher, and several times Violet had to stop climbing as the rope
            moved in the wind.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Она может выйти замуж, если получит разрешение от своего законного
            опекуна, действующего по родительскому праву, – возразил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She was certain that at any moment the cloth would tear, or the hook
            would slip, and Violet would be sent tumbling to her death.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Это я тоже прочитал.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
