            be!'' Justice Strauss cried.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Крюк Вайолет зацепился за другой крюк – за руку крюкастого типа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``The marriage laws in this community are quite simple,'' Count Olaf
            said. ``The bride must say ``I do'' in the presence of a judge like
            yourself, and sign an explanatory document.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А второй его крюк, поблескивая в лунном свете, тянулся прямо к ней.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            And all of you''-here Count Olaf gestured out to the audience-``are
            witnesses.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Глава одиннадцатая
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``But Violet is only a child!'' one of the actors said. ``She's not
            old enough to marry.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Как приятно, что ты решила к нам присоединиться,– приторным
            голосом произнес крюкастый.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``She is if her legal guardian agrees,'' Count Olaf said, ``and in
            addition to being her husband, I am her legal guardian.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет хотела сразу же скользнуть по веревке вниз, но помощник
            Графа Олафа оказался проворнее.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``But that piece of paper is not an official document!'' Justice
            Strauss said. ``That's just a stage prop!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он мгновенно втащил ее в комнату и резким движением швырнул вниз
            спасательное устройство.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf took the paper from Violet's hand and gave it to Justice
            Strauss. ``I think if you look at it closely you will see it is an
            official document from City Hall.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Металлическая кошка со звоном ударилась о землю.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Justice Strauss took the document in her hand and read it quickly.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет тоже попалась в капкан.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Then, closing her eyes, she sighed deeply and furrowed her brow,
            thinking hard.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я рад, что ты тут, – повторил крюкастый.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus watched her and wondered if this were the expression Justice
            Strauss had on her face whenever she was serving on the High Court.
            ``You're right,'' she said finally, to Count Olaf, ``this marriage,
            unfortunately, is completely legal.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я как раз очень соскучился по твоей хорошенькой мордашке.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet said ``I do,'' and signed her name here on this paper.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Садись сюда.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf, you are Violet's husband, and therefore in complete
            control of her estate.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Что вы собираетесь со мной делать? – спросила Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``That can't be!'' said a voice from the audience, and Klaus
            recognized it as the voice of Mr. Poe.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я сказал – сядь! – прорычал крюкастый и толкнул ее на стул.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He ran up the stairs to the stage and took the document from Justice
            Strauss. ``This is dreadful nonsense.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет оглядела скудно освещенную неряшливую комнату.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I'm afraid this dreadful nonsense is the law,'' Justice Strauss
            said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            В течение вашей жизни вам приходилось, наверное, замечать, что
            людское жилье обычно отражает личность своих обитателей.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Her eyes were filling up with tears. ``I can't believe how easily I
            was tricked,'' she said. ``I would never do anything to harm you
            children.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            В моей комнате, например, собраны самые разные предметы, которые
            представляют для меня особую важность.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Never.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Среди них – пыльный аккордеон, на котором я могу сыграть несколько
            грустных мелодий, толстая пачка записей о деятельности бодлеровских
            сирот и давным-давно сделанная, потускневшая от времени фотография
            женщины по имени Беатрис.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``You were easily tricked,'' Count Olaf said, grinning, and the
            judge began to cry. ``It was child's play, winning this fortune.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Предметы эти для меня очень ценны и дороги.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Now, if all of you will excuse me, my bride and I need to go home
            for our wedding night.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Комната в башне тоже содержала вещи, которые, видимо, были важны и
            дороги для Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``First let Sunny go!'' Klaus burst out. ``You promised to let her
            go!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но вещи эти были страшные.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Where is Sunny?'' Mr. Poe asked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Обрывки бумаги, на которых неразборчивым почерком были записаны его
            злодейские планы; они неопрятным ворохом лежали на «Матримониальном
            праве», которое он отобрал у Клауса.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``She's all tied up at the moment,'' Count Olaf said, ``if you will
            pardon a little joke.'' His eyes shone as he pressed buttons on the
            walkie-talkie, and waited while the hook-handed man answered.
            ``Hello? Yes, of course it's me, you idiot.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Тут и там стояло несколько стульев и горело несколько свечей,
            которые отбрасывали колеблющиеся тени.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Everything has gone according to plan.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            По всему полу валялись пустые бутылки из-под вина и немытые тарелки.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Please remove Sunny from her cage and bring her directly to the
            theater.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но больше всего там было рисунков – карандашных и маслом, а также
            вырезанных из дерева изображений глаз – больших, маленьких, всяких:
            глаза на потолке, глаза, процарапанные на грязном дощатом полу,
            глаза, кое-как нарисованные на подоконнике, а один большой глаз
            красовался на круглой ручке двери, которая вела на лестницу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Klaus and Sunny have some chores to do before they go to bed.''
            Count Olaf gave Klaus a sharp look. ``Are you satisfied now?'' he
            asked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Жуткое место!
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Yes,'' Klaus said quietly.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Крюкастый залез в карман своего засаленного пальто и вытащил рацию.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He wasn't satisfied at all, of course, but at least his baby sister
            was no longer dangling from a tower.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С некоторым трудом он нажал на кнопку и подождал минутку.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Don't think you're so safe,'' the bald man whispered to Klaus.
            ``Count Olaf will take care of you and your sisters later.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Босс, это я, – сказал он.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He doesn't want to do it in front of all these people.'' He did not
            have to explain to Klaus what he meant by the phrase ``take care
            of.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Ваша стыдливая женушка только что забралась сюда, чтобы спасти
            маленькую кусачую дрянь.– Он помолчал, слушая Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Well, I'm not satisfied at all,'' Mr. Poe said. ``This is
            absolutely horrendous.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Не знаю.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            This is completely monstrous.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            По какой-то веревке.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            This is financially dreadful.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – При помощи альпинистской кошки, – пробормотала Вайолет, отрывая
            рукав от ночной рубашки, чтобы перевязать себе плечо, – Я сама ее
            сделала.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I'm afraid, however,'' Count Olaf said, ``that it is legally
            binding.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Говорит, с помощью альпинистской кошки, – повторил крюкастый в
            рацию.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Tomorrow, Mr. Poe, I shall come down to the bank and withdraw the
            complete Baudelaire fortune.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Не знаю, босс.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Mr. Poe opened his mouth as if to say something, but began to cough
            instead.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Да, босс.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            For several seconds he coughed into a handkerchief while everyone
            waited for him to speak. ``I won't allow it,'' Mr. Poe finally
            gasped, wiping his mouth. ``I absolutely will not allow it.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Да, конечно, я понимаю – она ваша.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I'm afraid you have to,'' Count Olaf replied.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Да, босс.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I'm-I'm afraid Olaf is right,'' Justice Strauss said, through her
            tears. ``This marriage is legally binding.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Он нажал на кнопку, разъединил связь и повернулся к Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Begging your pardon,'' Violet said suddenly, ``but I think you may
            be wrong.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Граф Олаф очень недоволен своей молодой женой.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Everyone turned to look at the eldest Baudelaire orphan.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я ему не жена, – огрызнулась Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``What did you say, Countess?'' Olaf said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Ничего, скоро будешь.– Крюкастый помахал крюком, как другие
            помахивают пальцем.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I'm not your countess,'' Violet said testily, a word which here
            means ``in an extremely annoyed tone.'' ``At least, I don't think I
            am.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А пока я должен сходить за твоим братцем.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``And why is that?'' Count Olaf said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вы все трое проведете здесь взаперти следующий день до вечера.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I did not sign the document in my own hand, as the law states,''
            Violet said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Тогда Граф Олаф сможет быть уверен, что вы не придумаете еще
            какую-нибудь каверзу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``What do you mean? We all saw you!'' Count Olaf's eyebrow was
            beginning to rise in anger.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            С этими словами крюкастый, тяжело ступая, вышел.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``I'm afraid your husband is right, dear,'' Justice Strauss said
            sadly. ``There's no use denying it.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет услышала, как он запер за собой дверь и затопал вниз по
            лестнице.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            There are too many witnesses.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Едва шаги его затихли, Вайолет бросилась к Солнышку и положила руку
            ей на голову.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Like most people,'' Violet said, ``I am right-handed.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Развязать ее или снять со рта пластырь она не решалась, так как
            боялась навлечь, проще говоря вызвать, гнев Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But I signed the document with my left hand.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет только погладила Солнышко по волосам и прошептала, что все в
            порядке.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``What?'' Count Olaf cried.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Но, естественно, ничего в порядке не было, наоборот, все было из рук
            вон плохо.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He snatched the paper from Justice Strauss and looked down at it.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            В башенную комнату уже просачивался рассвет, а Вайолет все
            перебирала в уме ужасающие испытания, которые они с братом и сестрой
            пережили за последнее время.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            His eyes were shining very bright. ``You are a liar!'' he hissed at
            Violet.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Внезапно и страшным образом умерли родители.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``No she's not,'' Klaus said excitedly. ``I remember, because I
            watched her left hand trembling as she signed her name.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Миссис По купила им уродливую одежду.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``It is impossible to prove,'' Count Olaf said.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они поселились в доме Графа Олафа, где с ними обращаются
            отвратительно.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``If you like,'' Violet said, ``I shall be happy to sign my name
            again, on a separate sheet of paper, with my right hand and then
            with my left.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Мистер По отказался им помочь.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Then we can see which signature the one on the document most
            resembles.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они раскрыли злодейский план своего опекуна, который хотел жениться
            на Вайолет, чтобы завладеть бодлеровским состоянием.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``A small detail, like which hand you used to sign,'' Count Olaf
            said, ``doesn't matter in the least.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус попытался противостоять Графу Олафу, используя сведения,
            почерпнутые из книг судьи Штраус, – и потерпел неудачу.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``If you don't mind, sir,'' Mr. Poe said, ``I'd like Justice Strauss
            to make that decision.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Бедную Солнышко взяли в плен.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Everyone looked at Justice Strauss, who was wiping away the last of
            her tears. ``Let me see,'' she said quietly, and closed her eyes
            again.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            А теперь, когда Вайолет попробовала спасти Солнышко, она и сама
            стала пленницей.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            She sighed deeply, and the Baudelaire orphans, and all who liked
            them, held their breath as Justice Strauss furrowed her brow,
            thinking hard on the situation.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Б общем, несчастья в их жизни следовали одно за другим, и Вайолет
            пришлось определить их положение как глубоко прискорбное, а если
            сказать по-другому – «отнюдь не доставляющее удовольствия».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Finally, she smiled. ``If Violet is indeed right-handed,'' she said
            carefully, ``and she signed the document with her left hand, then it
            follows that the signature does not fulfill the requirements of the
            nuptial laws.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Шаги на лестнице прервали ее размышления, и вскоре крюкастый отпер
            дверь и втолкнул в комнату сонного, испуганного и сбитого с толку
            Клауса.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The law clearly states the document must be signed in the bride's
            own hand.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Так, и третий тут, – объявил крюкастый.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Therefore, we can conclude that this marriage is invalid.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Теперь пойду помогу Графу Олафу с последними приготовлениями к
            сегодняшнему спектаклю.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet, you are not a countess, and Count Olaf, you are not in
            control of the Baudelaire fortune.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            И чтоб больше никаких фокусов, а то я вас обоих тоже свяжу и вывешу
            за окошко.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Hooray!'' cried a voice from the audience, and several people
            applauded.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он свирепо глянул на них на прощание, запер опять дверь и затопал
            вниз по лестнице.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Unless you are a lawyer, it will probably strike you as odd that
            Count Olaf's plan was defeated by Violet signing with her left hand
            instead of her right.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус заморгал и оглядел грязную комнату.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            But the law is an odd thing.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он был в пижаме.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            For instance, one country in Europe has a law that requires all its
            bakers to sell bread at the exact same price.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Что случилось? – спросил он у Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            A certain island has a law that forbids anyone from removing its
            fruit.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Почему мы тут?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            And a town not too far from where you live has a law that bars me
            from coming within five miles of its borders.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Я пыталась спасти Солнышко, – ответила Вайолет,– и с помощью
            одного моего изобретения взобралась на башню.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Had Violet signed the marriage contract with her right hand, the law
            would have made her a miserable countess, but because she signed it
            with her left, she remained, to her relief, a miserable orphan.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус подошел к окну и посмотрел вниз.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            What was good news to Violet and her siblings, of course, was bad
            news to Count Olaf.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Тут так высоко.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Nevertheless, he gave everyone a grim smile. ``In that case,'' he
            said to Violet, pushing a button on the walkie-talkie, ``you will
            either marry me again, and correctly this time, or I will-''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Тебе, наверное, было очень страшно.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Neepo!'' Sunny's unmistakable voice rang out over Count Olaf's as
            she tottered onstage toward her siblings.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Жутко страшно, – призналась Вайолет,– но не так, как выйти замуж
            за Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            The hook-handed man followed behind her, his walkie-talkie buzzing
            and crackling.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Жалко, что твое изобретение не сработало, – печально заметил
            Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Count Olaf was too late.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Оно прекрасно сработало, – возмутилась Вайолет, потирая раненое
            плечо.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Sunny! You're safe!'' Klaus cried, and embraced her.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Просто этот тип меня сцапал.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Violet rushed over and the two older Baudelaires fussed over the
            youngest one.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            И теперь мы пропали.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Somebody bring her something to eat,'' Violet said. ``She must be
            very hungry after hanging in a tower window all that time.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Он пообещал держать нас здесь до вечера, а там нас ждет
            «Удивительная свадьба».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Cake!'' Sunny shrieked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А ты не можешь придумать что-нибудь еще, чтобы нам спастись
            бегством? – спросил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Argh!'' Count Olaf roared.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Попробую, – ответила Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            He began to pace back and forth like an animal in a cage, pausing
            only to point a finger at Violet. ``You may not be my wife,'' he
            said, ``but you are still my daughter, and-''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – А почему бы тебе не порыться во всех этих книгах и бумагах? Вдруг
            там найдется что-нибудь полезное?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Do you honestly think,'' Mr. Poe said in an exasperated voice,
            ``that I will allow you to continue to care for these three
            children, after the treachery I have seen here tonight?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Несколько часов подряд они перебирали все в комнате и у себя в
            голове, пытаясь найти что-нибудь, что могло бы им помочь.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``The orphans are mine,'' Count Olaf insisted, ``and with me they
            shall stay.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Вайолет искала предметы, с помощью которых могла бы что-нибудь
            смастерить.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            There is nothing illegal about trying to marry someone.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Клаус просматривал бумаги и книги Графа Олафа.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``But there is something illegal about dangling an infant out of a
            tower window,'' Justice Strauss said indignantly. ``You, Count Olaf,
            will go to jail, and the three children will live with me.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Время от времени они подходили к Солнышку, ободряюще улыбались ей и
            трепали по головке.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Arrest him!'' a voice said from the audience, and other people
            took up the cry.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Изредка они перебрасывались словами друг с другом, но большей частью
            молчали, погруженные в свои мысли.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Send him to jail!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Примерно в полдень Вайолет вдруг сказала:
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``He's an evil man!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Будь у нас керосин, я бы сделала из этих бутылок коктейль
            Молотова.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``And give us our money back! It was a lousy play!''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Коктейль Молотова? Что это такое?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Mr. Poe took Count Olaf's arm and, after a brief eruption of coughs,
            announced in a harsh voice, ``I hereby arrest you in the name of the
            law.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Это такие небольшие бомбочки – бутылки с зажигательной смесью, –
            объяснила Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Oh, Justice Strauss!'' Violet said. ``Did you really mean what you
            said? Can we really live with you?''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Мы бы их выбросили из окна и привлекли внимание прохожих.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Of course I mean it,'' Justice Strauss said. ``I am very fond of
            you children, and I feel responsible for your welfare.''
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Но керосина у нас нет, – с мрачным видом подытожил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Can we use your library every day?'' Klaus asked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Они молчали еще несколько часов.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Can we work in the garden?'' Violet asked.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Жаль, что тебя или его нельзя обвинить в полигамии,– наконец
            проговорил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            ``Cake!'' Sunny shrieked again, and everyone laughed.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Что значит «полигамия»?
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            At this point in the story, I feel obliged to interrupt and give you
            one last warning.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Это если бы у тебя уже был муж или у него жена, – объяснил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            As I said at the very beginning, the book you are holding in your
            hands does not have a happy ending.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Тогда по здешним законам вы совершили бы преступление, даже если
            бы женились в присутствии судьи, сказали «да» и подписали бумагу как
            положено.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            It may appear now that Count Olaf will go to jail and that the three
            Baudelaire youngsters will live happily ever after with Justice
            Strauss, but it is not so.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Я прочел про это в «Матримониальном праве».
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            If you like, you may shut the book this instant and not read the
            unhappy ending that is to follow.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Но ничего такого нет, – сокрушенно заметила Вайолет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            You may spend the rest of your life believing that the Baudelaires
            triumphed over Count Olaf and lived the rest of their lives in the
            house and library of Justice Strauss, but that is not how the story
            goes.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Прошло еще несколько часов в молчании.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            For as everyone was laughing at Sunny's cry for cake, the
            important-looking man with all the warts on his face was sneaking
            toward the controls for the lighting of the theater.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Можно бы разбить бутылки и использовать их как ножи, но, боюсь,
            труппа Графа Олафа нас все равно одолеет.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Quick as a wink, the man flicked the main switch so that all the
            lights went off and everyone was standing in darkness.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Ты можешь ответить «нет» вместо «да», – предложил Клаус.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Instantly, pandemonium ensued as everyone ran this way and that,
            shouting at one another.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            – Но, боюсь,
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
            Actors tripped over members of the audience.
          </td>
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-cizra_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-rusko">
            Граф Олаф велит тогда отвязать клетку с Солнышком.
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr
          class="border-b transition duration-300 ease-in-out hover:bg-neutral-100 dark:border-neutral-500 dark:hover:bg-neutral-100"
        >
          <td
            class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-xorlo_lojbo"
          ></td>
          <td class="text-left align-text-top p-2 column-class-glico">
